1.name: Dagger
1.effect: On a High Roll give the target an additional 1 stack of Bleed.

4.name: Short Sword
4.effect: On a Low Roll do 1 less Damage. On a High Roll do an additional 1 Damage.

7.name: Long Sword
7.effect: On a Low Roll do 1 less Damage. On a High Roll do an additional 1 Damage.

10.name: Axe
10.effect: On a Low Roll do 1 less Damage. On a High Roll do Double Damage to Armor

13.name: Great Hammer
13.effect: This weapon does Double Damage to objects. On a Low Roll this weapon does half damage to objects instead of double. On a High Roll  Knockback the Target 2 tiles away from you.

16.name: Spear
16.effect: On a Low Roll you have a Range of 1 instead of 2. On a High Roll you damage Targets in a line infront of you instead of just the first Target hit.

19.name: Short Bow
19.effect: On a Low Roll you do 1 less damage to Armor Health. On a High Roll you reduce the Targets speed by 1 until the start of your next Turn. This effect does not Stack.

22.name: Hand Crossbow
22.effect: On a High Roll do an additional 1 Damage.

23.name: Crossbow
23.effect: On a Low Roll do 1 less damage. On a High Roll do an additional 1 Damage.

25.name: Popshard Rifle
25.effect: On a Low Roll do 1 less Damage. On a High Roll do Double Damage to Armor

28.name: Popshard Revolver
28.effect: On a High Roll, roll a dice. If you roll less than or equal to the number of rounds left in this weapon, you may do another Attack with this weapon without spending more dice.

29.name: Popshard Lever Action Repeater
29.effect: On a High Roll, roll a dice. If you roll less than or equal to the number of rounds left in this weapon, you may do another Attack with this weapon without spending more AP.

32.name: Popshard Shotgun
32.effect: Hits targets to the left and right of the target you aimed at. On a Low Roll only hits 1 target. On a High Roll it attacks in a Cone infront of you.

33.name: Shard Blade Dagger
33.effect: On High Roll give the target an additional 1 stack of Burn.

39.name: Lanturn
39.effect: Instead of doing damage this weapon gives stacks of Burn equal to its Damage. On a Low Roll you gain 1 Marked. On a High Roll give the target 1 stack of Marked.

40.name: Shard Infused Staff
40.effect: On a Low Roll have 1 less Range. On a High Roll give the target 1 stack of Stun

41.name: Boomerang
41.effect: On a Low Roll you dont catch the Boomerang and it flys 4 tiles behind you. On a High Roll give the target 1 stack of Stun.

42.name: Whip
42.effect: On a High Roll give the target an additional 1 stack of Bleed.

43.name: Shovel
43.effect: On a High Roll you can throw dirt into the targets eyes to give them 1 stack of Blind.

44.name: Raiper
44.effect: On a Low Roll loose 1 speed until the start of your next Turn. On a High Roll you may Move 1 tile.

45.name: Yoyo
45.effect: On a High Roll you may cast a spell through the Yoyo haveing it origonate from the location of the Yoyo, so long as you are holding onto the string.

60.name: bandage
60.effect:
Target a Creature, cannot target undead or constructs. Roll Medicine, 7+ Heal the target half your Medicine (rounded up).
Can be crafted with medicine or crafting Rolls.

61.name: medkit
61.effect:
Target a Creature, cannot target undead or constructs. Roll Medicine, 7+ Heal the target for your medicine.
Can be crafted with medicine or crafting Rolls.

62.name: healing spray
62.effect:
requires medicine 3 to be used properly. Target a Creature, cannot target undead or constructs. Heal the target 2 + your Level Health.
Can be crafted with medicine or crafting Rolls.

63.name: Smoke Grenade
63.effect: Throw Range 6. Cast Conjure Fog wherever it lands. The fog ends when the spell runs out, this spell cannot be countered or stoped early.

64.name: Frag Grenade
64.effect: Throw Range 6. Burst 1 centered wherever it lands. Targets within the area take 2 damage.

65.name: Flashbang
65.effect: Throw Range 6. Cast lightshow wherever it lands. Using the 2 dice given plus 4 for the sum.

66.name: potion of Heart
66.effect: Gain 4 Health. This goes away at the end of the next rest or when used.

69.name: potion of Soul
69.effect: Gain 1 Soul. This effect goes away after 3 turns (30 sec).

70.name: potion of StoneSkin
70.effect: Gain -1 Damage when Hit for 30 seconds (3 turns).

72.name: potion of Flight
72.effect: Gain Flight (Can move its speed in the air) for 1 minute (6 turns).

74.name: Holy Water
74.effect: Deals 1 damage to Undead when in contact (this does not remove the Holy water). This is needed to craft a potion of Life.

75.name: Sleeping Poison
75.effect: When ingested or put into the blood (coated blade) roll Body. You must get a 13 or higher, otherwise you Fall Asleep. The GM rolls a dice, you are asleep for this many hours or until someone wakes you up with damage or 2 dice.

76.name: Deadly Poison
76.effect: When ingested or put into the blood (coated blade) roll body. You must get a 13 or higher, otherwise take 2 Damage.

77.name: soul Rend Poison
77.effect: When ingested or put into the blood (coated blade) roll Soul. You must get a 13 or higher, otherwise gain 2 Soul Strain.

78.name: Paralysis Poison
78.effect: When ingested or put into the blood (coated blade) roll body. You must get a 13 or higher, otherwise be Frozen for 20 seconds (2 turns).

79.name: Cooking Tools
79.effect:
Grants the Action "Cooking" which can be used with Mind, Nature, or Medicine:
5+ Spend 5 minutes to create up to 3 Travel Meals from raw resources.
7+ Spend 10 minutes to create up to 3 Cheap Meals from raw resources.
14+ Spend 30 minutes to create up to 3 Decent Meals from raw resources.
18+ Spend 1 hour to create up to 3 Rich Meals from raw resources.
21+ Spend 2 hours to create up to 3 Royal Meals from raw resources.

80.name: Alchemist Tools
80.effect: Allows for crafting potions and healing items.

81.name: Smiting Tools
81.effect: Allows for crafting weapons and armors.

82.name: Thieves' Tools
82.effect:
Grants the Action "Lockpick" which can be used with Mind, or Thieving: 
7+ Unlock most locks. 
14+ Unlock a well made lock.
21+ Unlock unique locks.
28+ Unlock magical locks.

83.name: Tinkers Tools
83.effect: Allows for crafting most other items.

84.name: Rope
84.effect: It's rope. Typically in 1 Tile increments (5 ft.)

85.name: small Bag
85.effect: Increases items that can be carried by 1/2th [4 bits] of a tile.

86.name: Backback
86.effect: Increases items that can be carried by 1 tile [8 bits].

87.name: Cart
87.effect: Can carry 1*2*2 [32 bits] (width, length, height) tiles of stuff.

88.name: Wagon
88.effect: Allows for crafting while traveling, and can carry 2*4*6 [384 bits] (width, length, height) tiles of stuff.

89.name: Row Boat
89.effect: Can carry 1*2*2 [32 bits] (width, length, height) tiles of stuff. Only works in water.

90.name: Big Boat
90.effect: Allows for crafting while traveling, and can carry 2*4*6 [384 bits] (width, length, height) tiles of stuff. Only works in water.

92.name: Fire starters
92.effect: Can start a fire without rolling Nature.

93.name: Travel Supplies
93.effect: Contains all the necessities for travel excluding food, including Cooking tools. Fire starters, a Bedroll, a Lanturn, and 10 tiles of Rope (50 ft)

94.name: Travel Meal
94.effect: An assortment of dry goods meant for travel. It does not taste good.

95.name: Cheap Meal
95.effect: A prepared meal. It's better than Travel Meal but not by much.

96.name: Decent Meal
96.effect: A well prepared meal. Most will find this acceptable.

97.name: Rich Meal
97.effect: An expensive meal made for the wealthy. Most will find this tasty.

98.name: Royal Meal
98.effect: Kings and Emperors eat this. The best meal money can buy.

100.name: Oil
100.effect: Flammable. Can be used to refuel a Lantern or for cooking.

101.name: potion of Life
101.effect:
Revive a dead creature. The creature's Soul must be free and the creature cannot have been dead for more than 1 month.
requires a Phoenix Feather, Undying Heart, and Holy Water to craft.

102.name: Phoenix Feather
102.effect:
A golden orange feather that is warm to the touch.
If a Creature dies while in possession of the feather the feather turns to dust, the creature's Health is set to 1, and they are no longer on Death's Door.
This is needed to craft a potion of Life.

103.name: Undying Heart
103.effect:
A heart that continues to beat even when its body is lost.
Can be Consumed to permanently increase Health by 2.
This is needed to craft a potion of Life.

106.name: rune of Fire
106.effect: Makes the object warm to the touch. Attacks inflict an additional 1 Burn.

107.name: rune of Ice
107.effect: Makes the object cold to the touch. Attacks inflict an additional 1 Stun.

108.name: rune of Air
108.effect: Makes the object feel lighter. Attacks do 1 damage to another creature of your choice within 1 tile of the creature hit.

109.name: rune of Earth
109.effect: Makes the object feel heaver. Attacks inflict an additional 2 Knockback.

110.name: rune of Souls
110.effect: Increases the Users Max Soul Strain by 1.

111.name: rune of Heart
111.effect: On Rest gives the user an extra 3 Temporary Health (this stacks with other On rest gain tmp hp)

112.name: rune of Hostility
112.effect: When applied, name a type of creature (Humanoid, Beast, Construct, Monstrosity, Undead or Planar). The rune glows when that type of creature becomes hostile within 20 tiles of the rune. It glows brighter the closer it is to the creature, starting with Glow 1 to Glow 4 at its closest.

113.name: rune of Friendship
113.effect: When you are within 1 tile of another person using a rune of Friendship both creatures gain 1 armor.

114.name: rune of Chaos
114.effect: When doing an action if you roll a 6 turn another non 1 or 6 into a 6. When rolling a 1 turn another non 1 or 6 into a 1.

115.name: rune of light
115.effect: You can spend 1 dice to activate or deactivate this rune. While active the rune Glows 4 until deactivated.

116.name: rune of the Darkness
116.effect: While you are in the dark you do an extra 2 Damage.

119.name: rune of the Feather
119.effect: Half's the weight of whatever the rune is attached to. Turns 2 handed Melee weapons into 1 handed, this action reduces damage by 1.

120.name: rune of Lead
120.effect: Double's the weight of whatever the rune is attached to. Turns 1 handed Melee weapons into 2 handed, this action increases damage by 1.

121.name: Dimensional Bag (Bag o Holding)
121.effect: The Bag has the spell Pocket Dimension constantly cast on it. It is not tied to any one person and cannot be placed inside another Dimensional Bag or Pocket Dimension.

122.name: Scarf of the Fishs Tale
122.effect: An ornate scarf decorated with a story of love lost at sea. Once tied to a user, they are able to breathe underwater and can “talk” to aquatic life.

123.name: Ring of Illusions
123.effect:
A ring carved with ever changing runes that seem to describe any number of lost secrets.
A creature can bind itself to the ring. Once bound to a user, they are able to cast Minor Illusion at will, and can cast Create Illusion Twice a day without gaining Soul Strain. This effect resets at the end of a Rest.

124.name: Living Map
124.effect:
A ebony cloth map that shows glowing gold and white details.
When the map is opened it shows a detailed map of the surrounding area (200x200 tiles). The map shows the location of any creatures in its area. It wont show hidden areas or things disguised by magic such as Invisible creatures.

125.name: Cloak of Shadows
125.effect:
A ebony cloth map that shows glowing gold and white details.
When the map is opened it shows a detailed map of the surrounding area (200x200 tiles). The map shows the location of any creatures in its area. It wont show hidden areas or things disguised by magic such as Invisible creatures.

126.name: Enchanted weapon
126.effect:
A weapon forged by the greatest smiths.
Is found with a random rune inscribed on it. Can hold 2 runes.

127.name: Parachute Ring
127.effect:
A ring with a small engraving of a cloud.
When the wearer falls 5 tiles or more will cast Spectral Parachute on only the wearer. This can only be done once per day.

129.name: potion of Fire Resistance
129.effect: After taking damage from Burn reduce it by 2 instead of 1. This effect lasts for 1 minute (6 turns).

130.name: Haste potion
130.effect: In combat when you roll your turn dice, get additional 3. Outside of combat you gain 2 speed. This effect lasts for 30 seconds (3 turns).

131.name: Iron Ingot
131.effect: A single bar of processed iron. Not quite as strong as steel, but just as useful.

132.name: Philospher Stone
132.effect:
A small red/pink stone that numbs the touch.
You can convert small or tiny non-magic items into your possession into an amount of gold pieces equal to what it would cost to craft that item. Alternatively, you can turn gold into a raw non-magic item such as 3 gold to an iron ingot.

133.name: Ring of Soul Stealing
133.effect:
A silver ring with a black opal gemstone.
When in possession of someone with Soul the ring will use their Soul Strain to cast Sleeping Powder on them. This cannot happen if the Ring has cast this spell within 1 hour prior or the person has Maxed out their Soul Strain.

134.name: rune of Branding
134.effect: Attacks Mark the target until the beginning of your next turn.

135.name: rune of Spell Resistance
135.effect: When you have to roll dice when saving against a spell you can add 1 to 1 of the rolls.

136.name: rune of Hunger
136.effect: You can spend 1 dice to activate or deactivate this rune. While active You take 1 damage at the end of your turn; but you Heal 1 each time you hit a creature with the weapon inscribed with this rune.

137.name: fists
137.effect: On a High Roll move the target 1 tile of your choosing.
